website_summaries.verdict: The holy grail of shoes; stylish yet all-day comfortable.
pros: Available in fabric or leather uppers with a 3.75-inch heel
Versatile for work or evening wear
cons: Soles can be slippery, especially after they’ve had some wear

customer_reviews.title: Zipper issues with this shoe; was hoping to resolve with customer service
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is beautiful; however the zipper on one shoe won't stay closed so I'm basically "walking out of the shoe" and can't wear it. I contacted customer service for a replacement and they said only a refund was available. Very disappointing as I would have liked to have kept a version of this shoe without zipper issues
customer_reviews.author: Pam C.

customer_reviews.title: Unzipped
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of these shoes, but the first time I wore them, the zipper on one shoe, kept falling down. So annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Jurybox

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I wanted to choose zero stars. I was so excited to order these sandals as I have been eyeing them for a while. However, when I inboxed them, they were completely different shoes. I was terribly disappointed. Will be returned
customer_reviews.author: Amelie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable To Walk In
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing these for a very long time. I have a couple of black/white stripped shirts/blouses and these sandles are the perfect shoe to wear them with. They look awful "high" and thought that they would be extremely uncomfortable to walk in. But when I seen them on Amazon at a crazy sale price I went for it! So glad I did! For what ever reason these are so easy to walk in and at 63 years old they would have to be for me to keep them. You just don't feel the height in these. Trust me you will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits properly but its hard to close the ziper
customer_reviews.author: Taty M

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!  I have them in many colors!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and have them in many colors! I thought with the heel size and not having padding they wouldn't be comfortable. I was wrong...these shoes are build for comfort. I can walk all day in these shoes and my feet don't hurt me at the end of the day. When I am wearing these shoes, I get lots of complements. most people love the zipper up the front. I do too!
customer_reviews.author: Honest-Jane

customer_reviews.title: Order my normal size and there are a bit too ...
customer_reviews.text: Order my normal size and there are a bit too large. There is some slipping when walking that I did not experience with my last pair that I purchased of the exact same heel.
customer_reviews.author: BlueEcho

customer_reviews.title: It was not to my liking to receive someting different from what I had bought or had said
customer_reviews.text: They sent me another type of shoe, not the one I bought! Well, the one shown in the photo
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Great dancing shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size up and they fit perfect , beautiful comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.author: The Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best addition to my closet
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised with these shoes for my birthday by my boyfriend and I am IN LOVE!!! They were a little tight on the top of my toes but I stretched them a little and I can wear them comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Wrong pic!
customer_reviews.text: I received white shoes. I thought I had ordered the black color since the pic shows black shoes. Now realized the fine print shoes white shoes! This is such an inconvenience! Now I have to return them & pdse black ones!!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Product as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised! Size fits great and a very happy wife with MK faithful customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Diaz

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars Cuz I love the show but really I should have gotten maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars Cuz I love the show but really I should have gotten maybe half size larger. I'm a 9 but if I get larger I usually have issues with loose straps all over if I get any thing larger. Will try 9.5 next time.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA M.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes! Are perfect for any event, and always comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jannette Carolina Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: This sandal runs wide. My foot slips right through the toe cut-out, even with a pad inserted under the ball of my foot. Also a little too long. And the gold zipper is not a bright gold, much more muted. I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: TULA'S MOM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Stylish
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, and they're comfortable! My girl loves wearing these with her new MK watch!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly comfortable. The Zipper is smooth and works well. They go with everything and I get compliments every time I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: AGW

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fabulous and are my go-to shoes for daily wear. I own them in three colors: bordeaux, nude, and black crinkled patent. The heels are a perfect height, and there is something about the shape of these shoes that makes it very easy to walk. I find them very comfortable, and I get compliments most every time I wear them. I wore the bordeaux ones today and got three compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Best for wearing in short bursts
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow had to return the 8s for a pair of 9s. Best for wearing in short bursts.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these shoes. I have two pairs, black and nude. They look like they aren't comfortable but you will be amazed by how good they feel. I have flat feet and I can wear them all day, perfectly. I would totally recommend them to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Heel is a little higher then expected, but I absolutely love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Price

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoes but runs a little small; the zipper pinched the top of my foot,
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M.

customer_reviews.title: But they are the perfect height for that
customer_reviews.text: They kinda hurt near the toe area, they sqeeze alittle, but i brought them to wear for my baby shower so it could be my feet. But they are the perfect height for that.
customer_reviews.author: jajawest

customer_reviews.title: i love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: i am very happy, the size run perfect ... i am 6.5 and they are true size.the color is gorgeous... so far they are comfortable. thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: cast

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to walk or go dancing in. Always get great compliments about how sexy these shoes are. Get them!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie C. Lane

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SANDALS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! THEY ARE COMFORTABLE AND I CAN WEAR THEM WITH ANYTHING! ANOTHER GREAT FASHION PRODUCT FROM MICHAEL KORS!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes so I ordered a 1/2 size bigger and fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes arrived quickly and fit exactly as expected. For a higher heel, they are surprising comfortable. The zipper works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hammons

customer_reviews.title: They fit me true to size but I just didn't like the way they felt when I walked
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine had a pair of shoes simliar to this style so I bought them. They fit me true to size but I just didn't like the way they felt when I walked. Only issue about these was due to my personal opinion. Other than that, they looked good quality and fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I requested a size 8.5 and received a size 10. Really????
customer_reviews.author: Kay

product_meta.title: Michael Michael Kors Women's Berkley
product_meta.description:
Michael Kors is recognized as one of America¿s preeminent designers for luxury sportswear. His namesake company, established in 1981, currently produces a range of products through his Michael Kors Collection, KORS Michael Kors, MICHAEL Michael Kors labels, including women¿s ready to wear, women¿s accessories, and a full line of fragrance and beauty products for both women and men.

Michael Michael Kors gives you a sweetly simple sandal that is certainly not lacking in attitude with the Berkley. Bold fabric straps frame a strong, architectural silhouette while the highly polished zipper adds fashion-forward shine and bite. The heel shape gives you a nice balance of sharp and curved to further perfect your look.

Michael Kors is recognized as one of America's preeminent designers for luxury sportswear. His namesake company, established in 1981, currently produces a range of products through his Michael Kors Collection, KORS Michael Kors, MICHAEL Michael Kors labels, including women's ready to wear, women's accessories, and a full line of fragrance and beauty products for both women and men.
